title: Low-water-permeability foils based on bio-renewable cellulose derivatives
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00425F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tanner J. Hickman, Li Tao, Natalie Stingelin, J. Carson Meredith
The water vapor transmission rate of highly crosslinked carboxymethyl cellulose is one order of magnitude less than poly(ethylene terephthalate) due to minimization of interactions between water and hydroxyl side groups.
